data.title: Mika Nakashima to release first acoustic album “Portrait ~Piano & Voice~”
data.meta_description: Singer Mika Nakashima has announced the release of her very first acoustic album titled "Portrait ~Piano & Voice~". It will be released in the standard two…
data.text:
Singer Mika Nakashima has announced the release of her very first acoustic album titled “Portrait ~Piano & Voice~“.

It will be released in the standard two versions, a CD only and limited edition CD+DVD. The track list mainly consists of a mix between some of Nakashima’s past hit songs redone in an acoustic style, and a few completely new recordings.

“Yuki no Hana”, “LIFE” and “Helpless Rain” were some of the older songs that made it onto the tracklist. New songs include a cover of the popular religious hymn “Amazing Grace”, and two tracks called “Portait #1” and “Portrait #2”.

Fans who purchase the DVD edition of the album will be treated to a digest of her concert “Nakashima Mika Premium Live Tour 2018 8.19 Kanagawa Kenmin Hall Ko Hall”. 8 performances have been selected for the DVD. Check out the covers and full tracklist below:

CD only

AMAZING GRACE

Hanataba

Yuki no Hana

LIFE

portrait#1

Helpless Rain

Koe

portrait#2

RESISTANCE

Gift

Boku ga Shinou to Omotta no Wa

DVD

Hi no Tori

PASSION

Pierce

THE DIVIDING LINE

Hero

AMAZING GRACE

Yuki no Hana

Boku ga Shinou to Omotta no Wa

“Portrait ~Piano & Voice~” will be released on November 7th, 2018.
